listDefault

public java.util.List<CobblerSnippet> listDefault(User user)
Returns a list of default snippets accessible to this user i.e ones in /var/lib/cobbler/snippets minus spacewalk

Parameters:
user - the user has to be atleast a config admin to be able to access snippets.
Returns:
the snippets accessible to the user.
